title: Did Thomas Edison's mother lie to a letter that kicks him out of school?
subtitle: She tells an interesting story about the mother of the future inventor and lies to her son about his expulsion from school because of "mental insufficiency."
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Thomas Edison ' s mother lied about the contents of a letter from her son ' s school telling her that he had been expelled by the school because of "mental deficiencies."
